original_text: Lot and his two daughters left Zoar and settled in the mountains, for he was afraid to stay in Zoar. He and his two daughters lived in a cave.
korean_text: 롯이 소알에 거주하기를 두려워하여 두 딸과 함께 소알에서 나와 산에 올라가 거주하되 그 두 딸과 함께 굴에 거주하였더니

sentences.original_text: Lot and his two daughters left Zoar
sentences.korean_translation: 롯과 그의 두 딸은 소알을 떠났다

sentences.original_text: for he was afraid to stay in Zoar
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 소알에 머무는 것을 두려워했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: He and his two daughters lived in a cave
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 두 딸은 동굴에서 살았다
